member.name: P:YoutubeSearch.VideoInformation.Description
member.summary: Description of the video as shown in the browser. Empty string if not provided by Youtube

member.name: P:YoutubeSearch.VideoInformation.Url
member.summary: Full browser url to the video

member.name: P:YoutubeSearch.VideoInformation.NoDescription
member.summary: True if video has no description.

member.name: P:YoutubeSearch.VideoInformation.ViewCount
member.summary: Number of views at the moment of the request. This is the number which is shown in the browser and not necessarily the true view number.

member.name: P:YoutubeSearch.VideoSearch.encoding
member.summary: Specify the used encoding. Recommended: ASCII, UTF-8

member.name: M:YoutubeSearch.VideoSearch.SearchQueryTaskAsync(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Doing asynchronous search query with given parameters. Returns a List object.

member.name: M:YoutubeSearch.VideoSearch.SearchQuery(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Doing search query with given parameters. Returns a List object.
